articles.title: Sector Update: Consumer Stocks Mixed Late Afternoon

articles.summary: MT Newswires: Sector Update: Consumer Stocks Mixed Late Afternoon. Consumer stocks were mixed late Monday afternoon, with the State Street Consumer Staples Select Sect Related tickers mentioned: CMCSA, CTAS, MO, PSKY, UNF, WBD, XLP.
